creditline: Anonymous gift in memory of John M. and Janet B. McKelvey
description: Tall high shouldered seed jar with red ground with black pigmented geometric designs painted throughout; blade like pattern (feather pattern) painted on top of jar from rim to shoulder covering half ways around circumference; the other half is painted with various geometric design including a stairstep design at the center; below the shoulder is a series geometric designs including waves and stairstep patterns; repeating half circles (cloud patterns) are paint near the base acting as a border;
markings: Signed on bottom; Laverne Loretto; Jemez, N.M.;
title: Seed jar
